notes.text:
Played this thing of beauty from Leg 1 to KoG.
After juggling around with different decks from the new box, I decided to give Geargia an opportunity. This is the built that I reached KoG with. I like playing the control game, which is why I tried to do it without Ties Of The Brethren (which I will test out now at the KC-Cup Stage 1)
I also tested Forbidden Chalice during my climb, but ultimately kicked it in favour of the rebirths.
Pulse Mines buys whole turns vs CA, Masked Heroes and partially Sylvans; which is often the time you need to start your engines.
